titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (S.J. Res. 45) authorizing the use of United States Armed Forces in Somalia.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-97, by Mr. Wheat.

Rule provides for consideration of S.J. Res. 45 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. It shall be in order to consider as an original text for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Foreign Affairs now printed in the joint resolution. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 42.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/18/1993--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S.J. Res. 45 (authorizing the use of U.S. armed forces in Somalia).
